name: iOS Toggle - Interactive Component
description:
Note Join the interactive components beta to play the variant interactions in this prototype.


Pro Tip If your interactive component has a Mouse Up variant interaction, use Mouse Up for its instance interactions instead of Click.


To test out Figma's interactive components, I recreated the latest iOS 14 toggle UI, with on/off label and contrast accessibility options. Hold down to see the realism ðŸ‘€


The only part missing is the ability to drag the knob, because it looks like Figma can't detect Mouse Up after a Drag.
